generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings extending into the distance, suitable for vehicle travel.
- sidewalk: A paved path alongside the road, bordered by a curb and vegetation, is visible on the right side.
- building: A tall, modern building with a glass facade and scaffolding is visible in the background.
- vegetation: Numerous trees and bushes are present along the sides of the road and in the background.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings and trees, appearing overcast.
- person: A person can be seen standing on the left side of the road, near the sidewalk.
- car: Several cars are visible on the road, including a silver car directly ahead and a black car further ahead.
- pole: Several poles are visible along the road, including those supporting overhead wires and traffic signs.
- traffic sign: Traffic signs are visible mounted on poles along the road.
- fence: A fence is visible on the left side of the road, near the sidewalk.
- terrain: Grass and soil are visible along the edges of the road and sidewalk.
- truck: No trucks are visible in the image.
- bus: No buses are visible in the image.
- train: No trains are visible in the image.
- motorcycle: No motorcycles are visible in the image.
- bicycle: No bicycles are visible in the image.
